Event.name: Post_giving
Event.definition: <def-root>The stage immediately after the <fen>Donor</fen> gives the <fen>Recipient</fen> the <fen>Theme</fen>, i.e. when the <fen>Recipient</fen> has possession of the <fen>Theme</fen> and the <fen>Donor</fen> no longer does. </def-root>

Arg.name: Donor
Arg.definition: <def-root>The individual that has just given the <fen>Theme</fen> to the <fen>Recipient</fen> and no longer has the <fen>Theme</fen>. </def-root>

Arg.name: Theme
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The entity that the <fen>Donor</fen> has just given to the <fen>Recipient</fen>.
</def-root>

Arg.name: Recipient
Arg.definition: <def-root>The individual that has just come into possession of the <fen>Theme</fen>.</def-root>

Arg.name: Time
Arg.definition: <def-root>This FE indicates the <fen>Time</fen> when the Post_giving event occurs. </def-root>
